titles.title: Securing our Border Act
Securing our Border Act
To reprogram all remaining unobligated funds from the IRS enforcement account.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committees on Homeland Security, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
